vexMod:DrainingDoom.NAME: Draining Doom
vexMod:DrainingDoom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 5 Max HP. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

vexMod:CursedBody.NAME: Cursed Body
vexMod:CursedBody.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Become Cursed - Injury. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:CursedBody.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Become Cursed - Clumsy. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:CleverClash.NAME: Clever Clash
vexMod:CleverClash.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL If not, deal !D! damage.

vexMod:DeadlyDodge.NAME: Deadly Dodge
vexMod:DeadlyDodge.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, Exhaust and gain !M! Intangible. NL If not, apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.

vexMod:ReflexChannel.NAME: Reflex Channel
vexMod:ReflexChannel.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, Channel !M! Frost. NL If not, Channel 2 Lightning.
vexMod:ReflexChannel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, Channel !M! Frost. NL If not, Channel 2 Dark.

vexMod:Fear.NAME: Fear
vexMod:Fear.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust this and gain 1 Vulnerable.

vexMod:Greed.NAME: Greed
vexMod:Greed.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose 6 Gold.

vexMod:StrikeStorm.NAME: Strike Storm
vexMod:StrikeStorm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a card, play a Strike.
vexMod:StrikeStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, play a Strike.

vexMod:ChaoticReactor.NAME: Chaotic Reactor
vexMod:ChaoticReactor.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel a random Orb.
vexMod:ChaoticReactor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, Channel a random Orb.

vexMod:BurstPulse.NAME: Burst Pulse
vexMod:BurstPulse.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive abilities of your orbs.
vexMod:BurstPulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning. NL Trigger the passive abilities of all orbs.

vexMod:Overload.NAME: Overload
vexMod:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Channel a random orb for each Orb Slot you have. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:Overload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a random orb for each Orb Slot you have. NL Gain 2 Orb slots. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:CrumblingCrash.NAME: Crumbling Crash
vexMod:CrumblingCrash.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Draw a card.

vexMod:ComboTrick.NAME: Combo Trick
vexMod:ComboTrick.DESCRIPTION: Add a Shiv to your hand. NL Apply 3 Poison. NL Gain !B! Block next turn. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Discard 1 card.

vexMod:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge-Up
vexMod:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Frost. NL Add a random Power to your hand. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:ChargeUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Frost. NL Add a random Power to your hand.

vexMod:MidasTouch.NAME: Golden Touch
vexMod:MidasTouch.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked Attack damage, NL gain that much gold.

vexMod:PotOfGreed.NAME: Resourcefulness
vexMod:PotOfGreed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put one card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Draw 1 card.

vexMod:Jackpot.NAME: Jackpot
vexMod:Jackpot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Gain !vexMod:SecondMagic! Gold. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:SnowShield.NAME: Snow Shield
vexMod:SnowShield.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Frost. NL Trigger the passive abilities of all Frost orbs.
vexMod:SnowShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Frost. NL Trigger the passive abilities of all orbs.
